channel.title: Massing glitch please help
channel.description: when you attack you repeat the attack animation over and over..how do i fix this?

item.title: Massing glitch please help
item.dc:creator: @justlikers justlikers
item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

ok thanks.
will that work to pimpscape?
ok i already have that but the delay was at 8 so i changed it to 16 :)[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 11:10:02 AM[/size][hr]didnt work…it still does it…
i dont mean the speed of the axe, i mean its swinging up and down like crazy
ITS DOING IT FOR EVERY WEPEON.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 11:16:16 AM[/size][hr]i got it, i mean the time delay in between hits…thats what im looking for[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 11:25:09 AM[/size][hr]so does anyone know? please this is getting very anyoying

item.title: Massing glitch please help
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Oh wait i get what your saying now…on you pm that you sent me this fixes your dh axe problem…

Search:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4718)) //dharoks axe

Replace everything with this…

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4718)) //dharoks axe { PkingDelay = 16; wepdelay = 16; }

Read full topic
